eligibility_and_timeline.clean_text: Customers have up to 30 days from the date of delivery to request a return or exchange.
Items must be unused, in their original packaging, and include all tags and proof of purchase.
Products that are personalized, perishable, or marked as final sale are non-returnable.
For hygiene and safety reasons, certain personal care products, consumables, and digital downloads cannot be returned.

segments.clean_text: Contact customer support with your order ID and the reason for the return.
Documentation such as photos may be requested to confirm product condition.
Once approved, you will receive a return authorization and instructions on shipping the item back.
Returns sent without authorization may be refused.
We cover return shipping for items received damaged, defective, or incorrect.
For change-of-mind returns, customers may be responsible for return shipping and any restocking fees.

refunds_and_exchanges.clean_text: Refunds can be issued to the original payment method, as store credit, or by exchanging the item for another product.
Once the returned item passes inspection, refunds are processed within 7-10 business days.

segments.clean_text: Exchanges are subject to stock availability.
If the requested replacement is unavailable, a refund or store credit will be offered.

customer_responsibilities.clean_text: Customers are expected to use products as intended and not abuse the return policy.

segments.clean_text: Items should be repacked securely to prevent damage in transit.
Including all original accessories and packaging helps expedite the inspection process.
Customers may cancel an order before it has been shipped.
Once delivered, the return policy applies.

cancellation_rules.clean_text: Submit a cancellation request via customer support or your account dashboard using your order ID as soon as possible.

segments.clean_text: If the order is still in processing, it will be cancelled and a refund issued.
If payment has been captured, refunds are processed to the original payment method within 7-10 business days.

cancellation_rules.clean_text: Customized products, gift cards, and clearance items are generally not eligible for cancellation.

segments.clean_text: Once an order has been shipped, it cannot be cancelled.
Instead, customers may initiate a return through the standard return process.

delivery_timelines.clean_text: Domestic orders shipped via standard shipping typically arrive within 5-7 business days.
Customers can choose express shipping for a faster delivery window of 3-5 business days.

segments.clean_text: Orders are processed and dispatched within 24 hours of payment confirmation (excluding weekends and holidays).
Orders placed after 4 p.m. are processed the next business day.

delivery_timelines.clean_text: Once shipped, customers will receive a tracking link via email or SMS to monitor the shipment status in real time.

segments.clean_text: Delivery timelines are estimates and may vary due to weather, unforeseen logistic issues, or regional restrictions.
Remote locations may require additional transit time.

contact_information.clean_text: For questions about returns, refunds, cancellations, or delivery timelines, please contact our customer care team through the support portal or by emailing our helpdesk.
We aim to respond to all enquiries within one business day.
